org.firebirdsql.jdbc

Class FBConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.firebirdsql.jdbc.AbstractConnection
      • org.firebirdsql.jdbc.FBConnection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.sql.Connection, java.sql.Wrapper, FirebirdConnection

    public class FBConnection
extends AbstractConnection
    Firebird connection class implementing JDBC 4.2 methods.
    Author:
    Roman Rokytskyy
